title: Beachfront Adapter Params
description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Beachfront adapter

appId.description: The id of an inventory target. This can only be used in requests that contain one media type. It will be applied to all imps in the request.

appIds.description: The id of an inventory target. This will be applied to video imps in the mixed media request. It should not be used in single media type imps

video.description: An array of appIds that will be applied to video requests in this imp.

banner.description: An array of appIds that will be applied to banner requests in this imp.

bidfloor.description: The price floor for the bid
